Description: Sales CRM for small teams with big ambitions.
Name: Pipedrive (OAuth2.0)

Methods.Name: List Updated Pipelines
Methods.Description: Returns a list of pipelines new/updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Pipeline
Methods.Description: Returns data about a specific pipeline.

Methods.Name: Update Pipeline
Methods.Description: Update the properties of a pipeline.

Methods.Name: List New Pipelines
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new pipelines created since the last successful run.

Methods.Name: Add Pipeline
Methods.Description: Adds a Pipeline.

Methods.Name: Get Currencies
Methods.Description: Returns all supported currencies in given account which should be used when saving monetary values with other objects. The 'code' parameter of the returning objects is the currency code according to ISO 4217 for all non-custom currencies.

Methods.Name: List Teams
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all Teams.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Returns data about all users.

Methods.Name: Get User Role Settings
Methods.Description: Get a users role settings.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Get a users details.

Methods.Name: List Users Blacklisted Email Addresses
Methods.Description: List all blacklisted email addresses of the specified user.

Methods.Name: List Updated Users
Methods.Description: Returns a list of users new/updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Update User
Methods.Description: Updates the properties of a user.

Methods.Name: Create User
Methods.Description: Adds a new user to the company, returns the ID upon success.

Methods.Name: List New Users
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new users since last successful run.

Methods.Name: Get Current User
Methods.Description: Get the currently authenticated users details.

Methods.Name: Find Users By Name
Methods.Description: Find users by their name.

Methods.Name: List User Followers
Methods.Description: List followers of a specific user.

Methods.Name: List New Filters
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new filters since last successful run.

Methods.Name: Delete Filter
Methods.Description: Delete an existing filter

Methods.Name: Add Filter
Methods.Description: Add a new filter

Methods.Name: List Updated Filters
Methods.Description: Returns a list of filters new/updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List All Filters
Methods.Description: Returns data about all filters.

Methods.Name: Get Filter
Methods.Description: Returns data about a single filter.

Methods.Name: Get Mail Message
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified mail message.

Methods.Name: List Deal Mail Messages
Methods.Description: Lists mail messages associated with a deal.

Methods.Name: Get New Notes
Methods.Description: Returns all new notes.

Methods.Name: Update Note
Methods.Description: Updates a note.

Methods.Name: List Updated Notes
Methods.Description: Returns a list of notes new/updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Add a Note
Methods.Description: Adds a note.

Methods.Name: Get All Notes
Methods.Description: Returns all notes.

Methods.Name: Get Note
Methods.Description: Get details of the specified Note.

Methods.Name: Delete Note
Methods.Description: Deletes a note.

Methods.Name: List People by Owner ID
Methods.Description: Returns a list of people by Owner ID.

Methods.Name: Get People by Email Address
Methods.Description: Returns a list of people matching the email address provided.

Methods.Name: List Updated People
Methods.Description: Returns a list of people new/updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Person
Methods.Description: Gets all the details of a person.

Methods.Name: Delete Person
Methods.Description: Deletes a person.

Methods.Name: List People
Methods.Description: Returns a list of people.

Methods.Name: Update Person
Methods.Description: Updates a person's details.

Methods.Name: Add Person
Methods.Description: Adds a new person.

Methods.Name: List Updated People by Owner ID
Methods.Description: Returns a list of people new/updated since last run filtered by their owner ID

Methods.Name: List New People
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new people created since the last successful run.

Methods.Name: Search People
Methods.Description: Searches all people by name, email, phone, notes and/or custom fields.

Methods.Name: Get Person V2
Methods.Description: Gets all the details of a person.

Methods.Name: List Deals by Stage
Methods.Description: Returns all deals at a specific stage.

Methods.Name: List Deal Products
Methods.Description: Lists products associated with a deal.

Methods.Name: Delete Deal
Methods.Description: Marks a deal as deleted.

Methods.Name: List Deal Participants
Methods.Description: Lists participants associated with a deal.

Methods.Description: Returns a list of deals new/updated since last run.

Methods.Description: Returns a list of new deals since last successful run.

Methods.Name: List Deals
Methods.Description: Returns all deals.

Methods.Name: Get Deal
Methods.Description: Returns details of a specific deal.

Methods.Name: Add Deal
Methods.Description: Adds a new deal.

Methods.Name: Update Deal
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a deal.

Methods.Name: List Updated Stages
Methods.Description: Returns a list of stages new/updated since last run.

Methods.Description: Returns data about all stages in all Pipelines.

Methods.Description: Returns data about a specific stage.

Methods.Name: Add Stage
Methods.Description: Adds a new stage, returns the ID.

Methods.Description: Update the properties of a stage.

Methods.Name: Delete Stage
Methods.Description: Marks a stage as deleted.

Methods.Name: List Stages for Pipeline
Methods.Description: Returns data about the stages in the selected Pipeline.

Methods.Name: List New Stages
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new stages created since the last successful run.

Methods.Name: List Roles
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all roles.

Methods.Name: Get Deal Field
Methods.Description: Returns details of a specific deal field.

Methods.Name: List Deal Fields
Methods.Description: Returns all deal fields.

Methods.Name: Updated Stage
Methods.Description: Triggered when a stage has been updated.

Methods.Description: Triggered when an activity has been updated.

Methods.Description: Triggered when a product has been added.

Methods.Description: Triggered when a deal has been updated.

Methods.Description: Triggered when a product has been updated.

Methods.Description: Triggered when a person's record has been updated.

Methods.Description: Triggered when a note has been added.

Methods.Description: Returns all person fields in an array.

Methods.Description: Returns all person fields in singular format, no array.

Methods.Description: Returns data about a specific product.
